product_name: KIND Mini Bars Variety Pack - 12 count
long_description: The KIND Plus Mini Bars variety pack contains 4 great-tasting flavors of snack bars that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere. Package of 12 bars contains Almond & Coconut, Cranberry Almond + Antioxidants, Fruit & Nut Delight, Nut Delight. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
